thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 52 of 3505
thread.title: GL

author: GL
title: GL
text: My daughter had misplaced several school library books, and the full retail price was unacceptable. We looked online and found Thrift Books. I had not previously heard of the company. We were able to find each book in the format we needed and at very reasonable prices. When they arrived, the books were in excellent condition. They didn't even look used. I would recommend Thrift Books to anyone. And as an avid reader of books, I will definitely be ordering from them again.
